Title: Admin views all products with full details and inventory status
Description: Validate that an admin can retrieve the complete product catalog, including inventory status.
AcceptanceCriteria: Response contains full details for each product (name, description, price, category, images, inventory status).
Steps: Validate HTTP 200, schema matches Product array, inventory status is present.
ExpectedResult: All products are listed with complete details.

Title: Admin adds a new product with details
Description: Validate creation of a product with all required fields.
AcceptanceCriteria: Product is created, fields (name, description, price, category, images) are stored, inventory defaults set.
Steps: Send POST request with valid ProductRequest payload.
Validate HTTP 201, response contains new product ID and details.

Title: Admin updates product details
Description: Validate updating an existing productâ€™s details.
AcceptanceCriteria: Changes are saved and reflected in subsequent GET.
Steps: Send PUT request with updated fields.
Validate HTTP 200, response shows updated values.

Title: Admin marks product inactive
Description: Validate soft deletion (inactive flag) of product.
AcceptanceCriteria: Product is marked inactive and not visible in active catalog.
Steps: Validate HTTP 200/204, product status is inactive.
GET product and confirm inactive status or absence.
ExpectedResult: Product is not shown in active listings.

Title: Admin removes product from database
AcceptanceCriteria: Product is deleted, cannot be retrieved.

Title: Admin updates inventory and product availability
Description: Validate inventory updates for a product.
AcceptanceCriteria: Inventory levels are updated, availability reflects stock.
Steps: Send PUT request with new inventory value.

Title: Admin tries to add product without required fields
Description: Validate error handling when fields are missing.
Steps: Validate HTTP 400, error message specifies missing fields.

Title: Admin updates product with invalid data types
AcceptanceCriteria: ErrorResponse for invalid types (e.g., price as string).
Steps: Send PUT with incorrect data types.

Title: Admin deletes product that does not exist
Description: Validate error handling for invalid product ID.

Title: Admin adds product with fields at max length
AcceptanceCriteria: Product created or error if exceeding limits.
Steps: Send POST with name, description, etc. at max allowed length.
ExpectedResult: Product created or error for exceeding.

Title: Admin sets inventory to zero
AcceptanceCriteria: Product availability reflects out of stock.

Title: Validate API against SQL injection in product fields
Description: Attempt SQL injection via product name.

Title: Validate API against XSS in product description
AcceptanceCriteria: No script execution, error or sanitization.

Title: Performance of product listing with large data set
Description: Validate API response time and stability.
Steps: Populate catalog with thousands of products.

Title: Performance and concurrency of inventory updates
